definition: not derived or copied or translated from something else, an original creation (i.e., an audio recording) from which copies can be made
details:
adjective
- not derived or copied or translated from something else
= example: not derived or copied or translated from something else
- preceding all others in time or being as first made or performed
= example: preceding all others in time or being as first made or performed
- being or productive of something fresh and unusual
- not secondhand or by way of something intermediary, such as information
= example: not secondhand or by way of something intermediary, such as information
noun
- an original creation (i.e., an audio recording) from which copies can be made
= synonyms: master, master copy
- something that serves as a model or a basis for making copies
= example: something that serves as a model or a basis for making copies
= synonyms: pilot, archetype
